description:
Responsibilities:

  • develop new functionality and maintain existing one for several enterprise applications;
  • propose and introduce technical solutions in area of the responsibility. Communicate with adjacent teams to elaborate common solutions; 
  • implement important technical decisions; 
  • work in a team, which implies continuous communication with team members and proactivity; 
  • work creatively in situations when requirements are incomplete or inconsistent. Be ready to discuss requirements with business users; 
  • help team to solve technical issues.

Requirements: 
  • team Lead: Spring (IoC), ORM(any):Hibernate/iBatis/Cayenne/TopLink, AppServer: Tomcat/JBoss/WebSphere/WebLogic, Test: JUnit/JMock, Other: SQL, git/svn 
  • team management experience. 


Условия:
  • официальное трудоустройство согласно ТК РФ;
  • оформление полиса добровольного медицинского страхования (ДМС) на сотрудника и членов его семьи;
  • компенсация фитнеса;
  • бесплатное обучение в собственном Учебном Центре компании;
  • корпоративные скидки на различные виды страхования и кредитования.
name: Java Team Lead
